description:
The course will be taught from a practical standpoint with an emphasis on real-life problems that business owners or professionals encounter on a daily basis. If your work, assignments or projects require a lot of Excel usage, regardless if you are a student, professional or business owner, then this course is for you!


Some of the topics that will be covered are the following:

  • if-statements
  • sumproduct
  • sumif
  • error handling
  • trace dependents and trace precedents
  • pivot tables
  • filters
  • vlookup
  • grouping and hiding rows and columns
title: Excel (Beginner/Intermediate w. Shortcuts)
